      • receive

        public <T> void receive(DataPacketChatRoom<T> data)
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: IReceiver
        Receive a data packet. If it is an unknown data packet or possible error happens, the receiver asynchronously sends a data packet back to the sender.
        Specified by:
        receive in interface IReceiver
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the data being held.
        Parameters:
        data - the received data packet
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if a network error occurs
